quiz.name: Europe Cities Quiz
quiz.intro: This is a quiz about cities in europe

questions.title: Question 1
questions.description: Which of the following cities is in France?
questions.explanation: Paris is a city in France, Nice is a city in France

answers.explanation: Paris is a city in France
Champagne is not a city in France
Nice is a city in France

questions.title: Question 2
questions.description: What is the Capital of Denmark?

answers.explanation: Aarhus is not the capital of Denmark
Aalborg is not the capital of Denmark
Copenhagen is the capital of Denmark

questions.title: Question 3
questions.explanation: Hamburg is a city in Northern Germany

answers.explanation: Hamburg is a city in Germany
Hamburg is a city in Germany
